## Practice

## Laboratory session

Introduction to R/Python visualization environments:
- Setting up RStudio/Jupyter notebooks
- Basic plotting with ggplot2/matplotlib
- Saving and exporting visualizations
- Version control with Git

## Application exercise

Create your first visualization following the design process:
1. Define your audience and purpose
2. Sketch multiple design alternatives
3. Implement your best design in R or Python
4. Apply visual hierarchy and Gestalt principles
5. Submit with a brief design rationale (200 words)

:::
